description: This file defines a custom React hook, useTodos, which manages a to-do list with server persistence. It provides functionalities for fetching, adding, updating, toggling completion, and deleting to-dos, along with loading and error states, utilizing React's hooks and an external API client.

methods.name: useTodos()
methods.description: Main exported hook that manages the to-do list state and exposes methods to interact with it, handling server communication and optimistic UI updates.
